DOC.brief_summary: This 12 week placebo controlled clinical trial tests the individual and combined effects of an antidepressant medication and cognitive behavioral therapy for chronic back pain.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Antidepressants in Chronic Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This is a 4 arm 12 week randomized clinical trial comparing the efficacy of 1) low concentration desipramine (< 60 ng/ml); 2) cognitive behavioral therapy; 3) low concentration desipramine + cognitive behavioral therapy; and 4) placebo medication (benzotropine mesylate).
DOC.criteria: Chronic back pain (daily pain for > 6 months) Major medical conditions which might contraindicate antidepressant treatment
